title: SSW Rengar (when will it be purchasable again)
body:
Hello summoners, recently started to main Rengar and really like the SSW skin for him and was wondering when will it be available for purchase again. Is there a way to get it guaranteed while not purchasable in store?

Thank you!

replies.body: Team based skins usually come available around the time of the world championships. Following this pattern, it should be available again around October.
